alert.note: Alert for Georgetown; Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued August 07 at 9:00PM EDT until August 08 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 607 REMAINS VALID UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST NORTH CAROLINA BRUNSWICK COLUMBUS NEW HANOVER PENDER IN SOUTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST SOUTH CAROLINA GEORGETOWN HORRY THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ANDREWS, BOILING SPRING LAKES, BURGAW, CHADBOURN, CONWAY, GARDEN CITY, GEORGETOWN, LAKE WACCAMAW, LELAND, LITTLE RIVER, LONG BEACH, MURRELLS INLET, MYRTLE BEACH, NORTH MYRTLE BEACH, OAK ISLAND, RED HILL, SOCASTEE, SOUTHPORT, SUNSET BEACH, SURF CITY, TABOR CITY, WHITEVILLE, AND WILMINGTON.
